page.title: 16COLINTON DELL
page.content: When we went to Colinton Dell we had a great day. With all the open spaces it was a super place to do anything from eating our packed lunch to orienteering. The water was very cool for cooling your feet on such a hot day. Many people fish here because it is easy to get a permit. Trout is the main fish which they catch. We saw the ruins of an old mill and it was very interesting.There are many mills and a few are still operating. Because of the many trees, the river with its bridges and the hills and valleys, the Dell is good for orienteering. While we were orienteering we saw some football pitches. It was very lively for us but others we met were enjoying the peace. At the end of the day we were all very tired so we went down to a shady peaceful place to rest.
